name: Black Ice
description: A cross between hybrids Black Domina and White Widow, Black Ice is an indica-dominant hybrid that is a reliable sedative. Although this flower has a pleasant aroma, its potency sets it apart from the rest. A product of Moon Seeds, Black Ice offers a high yield with an impressive THC content of up to 24%, making this strain optimal for pain and insomnia relief.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Hungry, Tingly, Pain, Insomnia, Stress, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Anxious
